name: Micromedes
description:
Micromedes is a game I made on my free time during the month of May 2016.

- CONTROLS

ZQSD or Arrow Keys: moving as usual

Mouse Left Click: interacting

Mouse Right Click (HOLD): camera

Mouse Left Click (HOLD): moving faster

A & E: camera rotation

Space Bar: moving upwards

Left Shift: moving downwards

Escape (HOLD): close the game

[RULES]
Each cube has 6 faces, each corresponding to a direction it influences.
Click on a cube to activate it.
Activating a cube breaks every cube in the 6 directions it influences.
The influences of cubes cannot cross path, else the activated cubes become overloaded.
To complete a level, every cube must be either broken or activated (so every visible cube must be activated).

[BUGS]
Sometimes you unlock levels when you haven't completed a level
Sometimes you don't unlock levels when you have completed a level
Some cubes start activated making some puzzles unsolvable
